lead_paragraph: An arson investigator who wrote a novel about a pyromaniac firefighter was convicted Friday of burning three stores in Fresno, Bakersfield and Tulare. A jury in Federal District Court here found that John L. Orr, a 42-year-old fire captain in the Los Angeles suburb of Glendale, had set the blazes during and after an arson investigators' convention he had attended in Fresno.

headline.main: On Arson, Convicted Sleuth Wrote the Book
